alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 7:46PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN SHANNON AND SOUTHEASTERN DENT COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Bunker, or 22 miles southeast of Salem, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Echo Bluff State Park, Current River State Park, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Bunker, Round Spring and Midridge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
